ingredients.ingredient: ⅓ cup creamy salad dressing (e.g. Miracle Whip)

cookingTips: Mix oyster sauce and salad dressing evenly before coating salmon
Bake salmon at 400°F for 12-15 minutes until it flakes easily
Brush glaze on salmon partway through cooking to prevent burning
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook on testing salmon for doneness and balancing umami from oyster sauce with creaminess from dressing.
